original_text: And Joshua gathered all the tribes of Israel to Shechem, and called for the elders of Israel, and for their heads, and for their judges, and for their officers; and they presented themselves before God.
korean_text: 여호수아가 이스라엘 모든 지파를 세겜에 모으고 이스라엘 장로들과 그들의 수령들과 재판장들과 관리들을 부르매 그들이 하나님 앞에 나와 선지라

sentences.original_text: And Joshua gathered all the tribes of Israel to Shechem
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 여호수아가 이스라엘 모든 지파를 세겜으로 모으고

sentences.original_text: and called for the elders of Israel
and they presented themselves before God
